bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition Combined Designation of yong 癰 , obstruction-illness, and lou chuang 漏瘡 , leaking sores. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry tu fu ling 土茯苓 quotes a Wang Ji 汪機：近有好淫之人，多病楊 梅毒瘡，藥用輕粉，愈而復發，久則肢體拘攣，變為癰漏，延綿歲月， 竟致廢篤 , “Recently people who have indulged in licentiousness have often suffered from red bayberry poison sores. For medication one uses qing fen , but once it is cured, [the disease] will break out again. After an extended period of time, the limbs and the body develop cramps and contract, and the [disease] develops into an obstruction-illness with leakage . This will last for years before eventually completely maiming [a person]”.
